# numberOfSections(in:)

**Instance Method**

Asks the data source to return the number of sections in the table view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func numberOfSections(in tableView: UITableView) -> Int
```

## Parameters

- **tableView**: An object representing the table view requesting this information.

## Return Value

The number of sections in `tableView`.

## Discussion

If you don’t implement this method, the table configures the table with one section.

## Providing the number of rows and sections

- **tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)**: Tells the data source to return the number of rows in a given section of a table view.

items.description: Tells the data source to return the number of rows in a given section of a table view.
